message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing [product name] and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm asking for $200 for it. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for offering the [product name]. I'm interested, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Could we possibly negotiate the price down to $175?

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  I'm willing to come down to $185. That's still a great deal for this [product name] and it leaves some room for both of us to be happy. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, I appreciate your flexibility. Considering my budget, could we possibly agree on $170 for the [product name]? This would allow me to stay within my financial limits while still acquiring the item.
